entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
